ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 1
ygData.msgSnippet: I must say I was overjoyed when I found this thread!  I have been messing with tinkering for quite sometime and guess what. I have not found fire water. I have
ygData.messageBody:
I must say I was overjoyed when I found this thread! I have been messing with
tinkering for quite sometime and guess what.

I have not found fire water.
I have not combined anything that worked.

I knew you'd all be happy.

> Subject: Firewater
>
> I just read from the Brewers list that Malt doesn't behave like other
> alchohols. You can't right click on it to drink it. They think that it
> behaves more like water and can possibly be used in place of water. Could
> this be the elusive firewater. Someone try it and let me know please.
> Thanks
> Aahzmozius the Enchanter, Ero. Marr
